data.lyric:
[ti:Chasing After You]
[ar:Ryan Hurd/Maren Morris]
[al:Chasing After You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.84]Chasing After You - Ryan Hurd/Maren Morris
[00:02.06]Lyrics by：Brinley Addington/Jerry Flowers
[00:03.07]Composed by：Brinley Addington/Jerry Flowers
[00:04.71]Ryan Hurd：
[00:15.07]You come over when your wine's all gone
[00:18.87]Always catch me when I'm not that strong
[00:22.31]Then you wind up staying all night long
[00:26.13]Ain't nothin' new
[00:29.69]Then I wake up with you on my chest
[00:33.27]You got a way of making me forget
[00:36.80]Girl with you the answer's always yes
[00:40.48]Every time you call
[00:42.96]But I know yeah I know it's a matter of time
[00:46.70]'Till you walk 'till you walk back out of my life
[00:50.31]Leave me standing here lonely feeling like a fool
[00:57.71]Every time every time you say we're done
[01:01.29]You come back to the love you were running from
[01:04.65]Don't know why don't know why I let you but I do
[01:09.99]Guess I love chasing after you
[01:14.03]Maren Morris：
[01:19.45]Listen
[01:20.39]Wish I could quit you but it feels too good
[01:23.99]If I could turn it off you know I would
[01:27.63]But somethin' 'bout you makes me think we could
[01:31.19]Make it after all
[01:34.16]But I know yeah I know it's a matter of time
[01:37.57]'Till you walk 'till you walk back out of my life
[01:41.23]Leave me standing here lonely feeling like a fool
[01:48.64]Every time every time you say we're done
[01:52.19]You come back to the love you were running from
[01:55.57]Don't know why don't know why I let you but I do
[02:00.99]Guess I love chasing after you
[02:05.58]Ryan Hurd：
[02:20.96]You come over when your wine's all gone
[02:24.13]Always catch me when I'm not that strong
[02:27.67]Then you wind up staying all night long
[02:31.53]Ain't nothin' new
[02:33.94]But I know yeah I know it's a matter of time
[02:37.58]'Till you walk 'till you walk back out of my life
[02:41.19]Leave me standing here lonely feeling like a fool
[02:47.96]Yeah every time every time you say we're done
[02:52.08]You come back to the love you were running from
[02:55.71]Don't know why don't know why I let you but I do
[03:00.93]Guess I love chasing after you
[03:06.48]I love chasing after you
data.trans:
[ti:Chasing After You]
[ar:Ryan Hurd/Maren Morris]
[al:Chasing After You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.84]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.06]//
[00:03.07]//
[00:04.71]//
[00:15.07]你的酒喝光了之后 就来找我
[00:18.87]总能抓住我不堪一击的时候
[00:22.31]然后你在我这里待一整夜
[00:26.13]不是什么新鲜事
[00:29.69]我一觉醒来 发现你躺在我的胸口
[00:33.27]你总有办法让我忘记
[00:36.80]姑娘 对于你 我总是无法拒绝
[00:40.48]每当你打来电话 都是如此
[00:42.96]但我知道 我知道这只是时间问题
[00:46.70]你总有一天会再次离开我的生活
[00:50.31]让我独自伫立在此 感觉像个傻瓜
[00:57.71]每当你说我们结束了时
[01:01.29]你都会回到我身边 重拾你曾逃避的爱
[01:04.65]不知道我为什么 我总是放任你这样做
[01:09.99]可能是我喜欢追随你吧
[01:14.03]//
[01:19.45]听着
[01:20.39]希望我能戒掉你 但和你在一起感觉太棒了
[01:23.99]如果我能浇灭这份情 你知道我不会犹豫
[01:27.63]但你让我感觉我们可以
[01:31.19]走到最后
[01:34.16]但我知道 我知道这只是时间问题
[01:37.57]你总有一天会再次离开我的生活
[01:41.23]让我独自伫立在此 感觉像个傻瓜
[01:48.64]每当你说我们结束了时
[01:52.19]你都会回到我身边 重拾你曾逃避的爱
[01:55.57]不知道我为什么 我总是放任你这样做
[02:00.99]可能是我喜欢追随你吧
[02:05.58]//
[02:20.96]你的酒喝光了之后 就来找我
[02:24.13]总能抓住我不堪一击的时候
[02:27.67]然后你在我这里待一整夜
[02:31.53]不是什么新鲜事
[02:33.94]但我知道 我知道这只是时间问题
[02:37.58]你总有一天会再次离开我的生活
[02:41.19]让我独自伫立在此 感觉像个傻瓜
[02:47.96]每当你说我们结束了时
[02:52.08]你都会回到我身边 重拾你曾逃避的爱
[02:55.71]不知道我为什么 我总是放任你这样做
[03:00.93]可能是我喜欢追随你吧
[03:06.48]我喜欢追随你
